title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Biden scolds reporter for asking Afghanistan question on 4th of July weekend. White House sends out tweet claiming the cost of food is cheaper (it's not). Biden on the economy. Joy Behar says negative stories about Kamala Harris are racist, claims right doesn't criticize Biden because he's white. Clay and Buck discuss movies. Callers on 4th of July BBQs and movies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
